mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT a.AUTHOR_CODE, B.MENU_NO -- AS "menuNo" , B.MENU_ORDR -- AS "menuOrdr" , B.MENU_NM -- AS "menuNm" , B.UPPER_MENU_NO -- AS "upperMenuId" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH-- AS "relateImagePath" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM -- AS "relateImageNm" , (SELECT C.URL FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM) AS "chk_url" FROM COMTNMENUCREATDTLS A, COMTNMENUINFO B WHERE A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{uniqId}) union all SELECT '', B.MENU_NO AS "menuNo" , B.MENU_ORDR AS "menuOrdr" , B.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , null AS "upperMenuId" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS "relateImagePath" , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS "relateImageNm" , '' FROM COMTNMENUINFO b where menu_no = 0) start with menu_no = 0 connect by UPPER_MENU_NO = prior menu_no
